fields.summary: plexus-compiler-eclipse is unable to compile project

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
During the compile phase of maven i receive the following errors:

[ERROR] 

Mojo: 

    org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:2.0.2:compile

FAILED for project: 

    de.gfpgmbh:office-module:jar:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT

Reason:

module\huw\text\HUWTB1.java:[1,0] The declared package does not match the expected package module.huw.text
module.huw.text.HUWTB1:[15,389] The serializable class HUWTB1 does not declare a static final serialVersionUID field of type long
module\eksov\text\EKSOVTBEU.java:[1,0] The declared package does not match the expected package module.eksov.text
module.eksov.text.EKSOVTBEU:[35,1416] The serializable class EKSOVTBEU does not declare a static final serialVersionUID field of type long
ui\workbench\IPerspective.java:[0,0] The type de.gfpgmbh.office.ui.contrib.ToolBarManager cannot be resolved. It is indirectly referenced from required .class files
ui\workbench\IPerspective.java:[1,0] The declared package does not match the expected package ui.workbench





[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] For more information, run with the -e flag
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILED
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------



Eclipse however is able to compile the project without any problems.
I have configured the plexus-compiler-eclipse plugin as followed:



                              <plugin>
					<groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
					<artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
					<version>2.0.2</version>
					<executions>
					</executions>
					<configuration>
						<compilerId>eclipse</compilerId>
						<compilerVersion>1.5</compilerVersion>
						<source>1.5</source>
						<target>1.5</target>
						<fork>true</fork>
						<maxmem>512m</maxmem>
					</configuration>
					<dependencies>
						<dependency>
							<groupId>org.codehaus.plexus</groupId>
							<artifactId>plexus-compiler-eclipse</artifactId>
							<version>1.5.1</version>
						</dependency>
					</dependencies>

				</plugin>


Thanks in advance

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

comments.body: Consider to provide a minimal example project to reproduce. This could as well be a misconfiguration.
